text: Braives is a Walloon municipality in the Belgian province of Liège. On January 1, 2006 Braives had a total population of 5,579. The total area is 44.00 km² which gives a population density of 127 inhabitants per km².braves.be , German-language, retrieved 2007-09-04 It is at 50° 37 North, 05° 08 East. ==References== Category:Municipalities of Liège
title: Braives
